scenes.text:
Welcome to Cardiff University Film Society: the home for film lovers, aspiring film makers and all things film! We are a very active and diverse society who are always open to newcomers.

We are a friendly group who love cinema and a laugh and would be glad to see you at one of our events! Do feel free to follow or message our instagram or join our discord to discuss films and to keep up to date with all of our events, including voting for our weekly movie nights.
We host regular events every Friday!
Our membership is Â£3.00 for the year!
Our socials include collabs with other societies, cinema trips, movie nights, film quizzes or just hanging out at the pub!
